A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was painful. Watch Mark Hamill's warnings that he gave ... he knew ... and they ignored him and made this mess. Script and story are a train wreck\, Finn and Rey were given so little to do ... This film injured our hopes and dreams for new characters and old alike. Luke drinking the alien milk ... why????  The fact that critics praised it beforehand ... suspect. If you feel the same\, speak out!
